title: Rene Fortaleza
text: Rene Fortaleza (born 30 October 1954) is a Filipino <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201972%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Flyweight">men's flyweight</a> event at the <a href="1972%20Summer%20Olympics">1972 Summer Olympics</a>. At the 1972 Summer Olympics, he lost to <a href="Fujio%20Nagai">Fujio Nagai</a> of Japan.
